intro: Iozoste elegans, commonly known as the elegant spurge, is a flowering plant native to parts of Africa. It belongs to the family Euphorbiaceae, which includes many species with milky sap. The plant typically grows as an annual herb with slender stems and small, green leaves. Its flowers are unisexual, with separate male and female flowers on the same plant. Iozoste elegans is often found in disturbed soils and can thrive in arid conditions.
